content: other sts even in 1x1 rib 11 15 21 29 31 sts remain bobble all remain sts in 1x1 rib finishing facings make 2 alike with smallest needle co13 13 13 15 15 work 26 26 26 27 27 inches in 1x1 rib as follows rs row k2 *p1 k1 repeat from * to last st k1 ws row p2 *k1 p1 repeat from * to last st p1 bobble all sts in established 1x1 rib seaming sew seams carefully being sure to line up color patterns as you go first sew shoulder seams then side and sleeve seams sew facings to front pieces facings should be sewn so that the bottom edge lines up with the bottom edge of the front piece and the top edge lines up with the first neck edge decrease pin the facings on carefully to properly line them up before seaming to make sure the color patterns on both front pieces line up with each other collar with mc using smallest needle with rs facing pick up and knit 13 13 13 15 15 from top of left side facing 9 10 11 11 13 sts at front left side of neck 4 3 4 4 4 sts at back left side of neck 34 34 38 42 46 sts at the back of neck 4 3 4 4 4 sts at back right side of neck 9 10 11 11 13 sts at front right side of neck and13 13 13 15 15 sts from top of right side facing 86 86 94 102 110 sts row 1 ws *p2 k2 repeat from * to last 2 sts p2 work short row shaping to create a round shawl collar as follows *work in 2x2 rib to last 2 sts with yarn held in front slip the next st to the right needle bring yarn to back and slip st back to left needle turn to work back the other direction repeat from * once *work in 2x2 rib to last 4 sts with yarn held in front slip the next st to the right needle bring yarn to back and slip st back to left needle turn to work back the other direction repeat from * once www andreaknits com the dude 9 copyright © andrea rangel 2013 continue working short row shaping by working 2 fewer stitches each row until you have worked to the last 28 28 28 30 30 sts and wrapped your stitches on both rs and ws after working to the last 28 sts wrapping and turning on the last ws row work in 2x2 rib to the end of the row knitting or purling sts together with their wraps in pattern turn and work to the end of the ws in 2x2 rib knitting or purling sts together with their wraps in pattern bobble all sts zipper carefully pin the zipper to the ws of the facing one piece at a time baste the zipper to the
